You were putting on strong signals that you were into her, but when your racist dad found out, one thing led to another and you ended up getting in a rather brutal fight. The end result was him forcing you to leave the house, claiming it wasn't safe for either of you. Luckily, you had Sakura's contact on your phone.

As you sat on the sidewalk, shaken and distressed, you decided that now was finally the time to stop beating around the bush. You were going to call Sakura, you were going to tell her your feelings and you were going to ask for her to eat and digest you into poop and ass fat. All this misery, all this turmoil that had hit you and your relationship with Sakura had happened for a reason and you took your forced removal from the house as a sign that things needed to happen sooner rather than later. You could sense she wanted this just as much as you and would, if anything, jump at the opportunity to digest her friend Marc.

You texted Sakura to come pick you up as a Green Honda CR-V slowly pulled up in the night. The driver lowered her window to reveal...
1131.title: Marc

choices: Aki drives you to her home.
11312.content:
In the driver's seat of the CR-V, you were surprised to see not Sakura, but her mother Aki. Aki's black hair was tied back in a bun, delicate glasses lay over her cute little nose. Her skin was rather light, her eyes black with light purple eyeliner surrounding them. She had a laid back, relaxed expression to her face, not the kind you would expect from a High School teacher. She was the kind of teacher you could easily see yourself talking to as a friend outside of school. Her body was curvy and plump on her chest and hips (With a bit of pudge on her belly), but her butt was absolutely to die for. It was massive, round and you were tempted to ask for a one stop trip out of it rather than Sakura's.

"Hey, Marc." Aki said pleasantly.

"Hey," you responded, smiling immediately. Aki certainly had that affect on you.

"Sorry, I probably should have given you a heads up, Marc." she sighed. "Sakura has a rough night of her own last night and I took her phone. Tried not to pry, but I know how dramatic things get with you and your dad. And when I saw the message was about him, figured I owed you a place to stay. At least for a night or two."

You smiled weakly as you got into the shotgun seat of the car. "Thank you," you nodded. Aki really was something special. She'd always give 100% of her effort if it meant she could help somebody; whether it was her daughter, her friends, her students...Or, perhaps, her future meals. After all, she had always been kind to you and she was pretty much the most gorgeous woman imaginable for her growing age. She could use a good gut slut.
11312.title: Sakura's voluptuous mom, Aki

choices: I want us to be together (Digestion)
I want us to be together (Romance)
113121.content:
The drive back to Aki's place was long, but...Relaxing. Soothing. There was very little traffic and the moment felt oddly intimate between you two. The wind rushing through the window, the cool and calming temperature putting you both in a tranquil mood. Aki was a big David Gray fan, and there was just something so emotionally charged about his tunes, they made you feel things you never thought music ever could. Looking at Aki, her aged beauty shining in the moonlight like an ocean...How did you never notice how perfect this woman was before? Empathetic, beautiful, sophisticated...If only she had been younger. Maybe you could have had something special together.

Aki briefly removed her gaze off the open road to give you a look of amused confusion, followed by a short laugh. Her smile was contagious, causing you to slightly laugh in impulsive, contagious response. "Why are you staring at me like that, Marc?"

"It's...Stupid," you told her dismissively. The last thing you wanted was to come off as a creep. This woman had been so good to you, you really had a good thing going. The last thing you wanted her to believe was that you were some entitled pervert who wanted to take advantage of her hospitality.

"There's no such thing as stupid feelings." she countered.

You raised an eyebrow, "I thought the saying was 'There's no such thing as stupid questions?'"

"Yeah, well, that too." she laughed. Again, you laughed at her cute, little quip in spite of yourself. In her moment of lighthearted banter, you mustered up the courage to try and confess your feelings.

"Aki...", you sighed, hesitantly. "I...Really like you. Like...More than just as a friend. Maybe, subconsciously, that's why I've been trying to remain single for so long. So I could maybe have a chance to be with you. And I was hoping...Maybe...Maybe we could just try things out. See if we like each other, like a trial run. Or, maybe...Maybe you could digest me. Because, I'm telling you Aki...If we can't be a couple, there's always going to be a part of me that wants to be together. Either through my body being digested into yours, into your fat and your shit and everything, or through...Well..."

Aki was dead silent the whole time. As you turned over, her eyes were completely on the road. Her mouth hung open slightly. Whatever she had expected your admission to be, you couldn't have caught her more off guard.

You felt terrible. "Aki, I am so, SO sorry!" you tried to tell her. "I didn't mean to take advantage and I didn't want to come across as entitled or creepy or weird..."

"It's not creepy." she calmly responded, her eyes still deadset on the road. "It's not weird either." Neither of you spoke a single word for the next 20 minutes as she drove you home.

Finally, you arrived at her house; a 3 story marble building with a pool built outside, deep in the countryside. You could only imagine how strenuous it must have been for Aki to drive Sakura to and back from here. You walked inside, being careful not to make too much noise, as Aki stopped you.

"Now Marc," she told you. "I thought about what you said. I do love you, Marc. I've loved you for a very long time. And we both have..."Needs" from each other...That need satisfying. And I think..."
113121.title: Aki drives you to her home.

1132.content:
You are Will Toro.

A brown haired, blue eyed college student, with a skinny and tall frame. He has just graduated college and is suffering from major depression, largely regarding his failed relationships with his two ex-girlfriends; Drea, a recently graduated, Haitian American Medical Student who's a year younger than him with freckles, an extravagant fashion style and a curvy, if not exactly large, frame and Banou, a larger black girl and art student with supple lips, brown eyes and a more relaxed fashion style. He wants to make things up to them in the ultimate way, through his digestion. He'll have to choose one of these lovely ladies to be digested by.
1132.title: Will Toro?

info.brief_description: A vore interactive where the protagonists seek their own deaths.
info.description:
This is a vore interactive wherein the main character, due to dissatisfaction with their life (or any other reason you come up with), has resolved to either end their life in a vorish fashion, or change their life for the better through romance (which is to say, every protagonist either wants to be eaten, wants to have a relationship with another character, or both).

As for the actual rules/guidelines:
1) The premise of this interactive involves people WANTING to be digested. Obviously, it's possible for something to change and for them to go unwillingly (including being eaten by a person, or in a way, that they don't want to), but if you take it down that road, you have to at least acknowledge the fact that this person does WANT to be eaten.

2) Due once again to the premise of this interactive, a typical plotline should end with the protagonist either dying inside of someone's body (ie: due to vore), or entering a committed and romantic relationship with another character. However you want to do the second one is fine: you could just say that the main character decided to live now that they have someone in their lives and end it there, you could allude to them starting a family in the future, or you could skip the whole thing and say they would live to 80 and then die in each other's arms, or you can do anything else you come up with; the important thing is 'romance' plots should END, and they should do so in a timely fashion, but with some kind of actual conclusion. This is done so that those stories actually END, instead of contributors just popping on over and over again to write about the same two characters having yet another sex scene.

3) Due to personal preference, the protagonist can only be eaten by women. You can assume the setting involves people of both genders being preds, and can make as many references to men devouring others as you want, but the main characters themselves can only be eaten by women.

4) For the same reasons as above: No macro preds, and no shrinking. Obviously people can be taller than the main character, but keep it within reason. As a rule of thumb, if a character is taller than an NBA player, they are too tall. If you want to have small preds (including children, little people, animals, or even a small magical creature such as a fairy, that fine; but NO macro preds) then that's perfectly fine. If you absolutely NEED a giantess or a male pred to enjoy one of these things, you should have no problem locating such material on Writing.com, or the internet at large. Further, you can always create your own erotic material. I did, and there's no reason you can't.

5) That said, any kind of vore is fine. Soft, hard, cooking, oral, anal, unbirth, it's all allowed here. Scat and watersports are also allowed, but a warning is appreciated.

6) You can write sex if you want. You can write any kind of sex act you want. However, if you couldn't guess from rule 3, there is to be no m/m sexual content in this interactive. m/f, f/m, and f/f are all fine. If you want to do a group sex scene, that's fine, the only caveat being that if there is more than one male involved, they can't do sexual things to each other.

7) Following from rules 3 and 6, a male protagonist cannot form a romantic bond with another man. Any other grouping (including more than two, for the polyamorous out there), is fine.
